cascom.fipa.envelope
Interface EnvelopeCodec

All Known Implementing Classes:
BitEfficientEnvelopeCodec
public interface EnvelopeCodec

Interface for all codecs intended for coding the message envelope of FIPA ACL message. This should be removed to more general package in the future.

Author:
Ahti Syreeni - TeliaSonera

Method Summary
 jade.domain.FIPAAgentManagement.Envelope decode(byte[] bytes)
          Decodes given bit-efficient envelope to envelope object.

          Encodes given envelope to bit-efficient.
 java.lang.String getName()
          Returns the FIPA -name of the envelope codec, the representation it uses.
